name: Sarah Johnson
role: Chief Marketing Officer at Digital Brands
advice: Trust your instincts, but always back them up with data.
Build a diverse team. Different perspectives lead to better solutions.
Make time for deep work. Block out hours for strategic thinking.
lesson: Resilience isn't about bouncing back â€“ it's about bouncing forward with new insights.
quote: Marketing is no longer about the stuff that you make, but about the stories you tell.

name: John Doe
advice: Embrace failure as a stepping stone to success.
Communicate clearly and often with your team.
Keep learning to stay ahead in a fast-changing world.
lesson: Listening to your team leads to the best decisions.
quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
